program.name: python -m ep_bolfi.kadi_tools.collect_and_fit_spline_to_parameterization_points
program.description: Please refer to the --help output of this file.

param.description: Persistent record identifier of the record with the data points.
param.name: input-record

param.description: File names of the parameterization result files, separated by '?'.
param.name: input-files

param.description: List of the dependent variables to fit a spline to, separated by ','.
param.name: input-names

param.description: Set to 'log' if you want to fit the spline to the logarithm of the data points and get the exponential of that spline as a result.
param.name: input-transformation

param.description: Allows the fitting spline to miss datapoints to reduce overshoots and lessen the impact of outliers. Defaults to the automatic setting in scipy.interpolate.UnivariateSpline. Set to 0 to force strict interpolation through all datapoints. For more fine-grained control, please refer to the scipy.interpolate.UnivariateSpline documentation.
param.name: spline-smoothing

param.description: Persistent record identifier of the record containing the information about the independent variable.
param.name: independent-variable-record

param.description: Filename of the file containing the independent variable points.
param.name: independent-variable-file

param.description: Name to index to the independent variable points in the JSON.
param.name: independent-variable-name

param.description: The segments that get selected from the dataset. Give as a list of 2-tuples and 3-tuples, e.g., '[(0, 2), (3, 20, 2)]'. Each tuple denotes one range of segments of the dataset to return. The 2-tuples give the range as in Python's [x:y] slice notation, i.e., they refer to segments x through y - 1, counting from 0. Use 'None' to count to the end of the data including the last segment. The 3-tuples give the range as in Python's [x:y:z] slice notation, i.e., they refer to each zth segment from x through y - 1, counting from 0.
param.name: independent-variable-segments

param.description: Persistent record identifier of the record to store the output of the spline fit in.
param.name: output-record

param.description: Optional extra text to append to the end of the filename. Use this to have different filenames for the same variable.
param.name: output-suffix

param.description: Choose either 'python' (default) or 'matlab' to have the spline representation printed as Python or MatLab code.
param.name: output-format

param.description: Whether or not an already existing file by the same name in the record gets overwritten.
param.name: overwrite

param.description: Toggle to display the plot on the machine this script runs on.
param.name: display
